{$start_id = 23000} {foreach $keys as $row} {if $row.device_key_category == "expansion"} {$key_id = $row.device_key_id - 1} {$type_id = $start_id + ($key_id * 5)} {$line_id = ($start_id + 1) + ($key_id * 5)} {$label_id = ($start_id + 2) + ($key_id * 5)} {$value_id = ($start_id + 3) + ($key_id * 5)} {if $row.device_key_type == "speed dial"}
